name: Jeremiah - Beta
description:
***Note: Availability and function of game will be sporadic the next few days as I do testing and updates of new features***

Hang out at the pond on your lily pad  snatching  insects out of the air as they fly by. Simple but engaging Retro style game play. 5 varieties of target insects, Flies, Bees, Dragonflies, Butterflies and Gnats.  Snatch highlighted targets for bonus points. Day and night cycles.  Accumulate huge scores and keep playing as long as you catch over 50% of the targets each round.

Controls

Launch Tongue - Left Click/Space Bar/Tap Screen(Phone or Tablet)

Notes: Game is still in development and will be updated frequently. Please report any issues to dubyastudios@gmail.com and include date of download, browser type and browser version if possible.

Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/DubyaStudiostm
